main_definition: More convenient, less difficult or simpler to do or understand than something else.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Better in terms of difficulty or effort required
meanings_and_examples.example: Learning Spanish is easier for me than learning Russian because I already know some Latin.

meanings_and_examples.definition: More comfortable to deal with emotionally or psychologically
meanings_and_examples.example: Facing the criticism of peers is easier when you have a strong support system in place.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Involving less risk or negative consequences
meanings_and_examples.example: Taking public transport instead of driving can be considered an easier option for reducing stress during rush hour traffic.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Better in terms of cost, time-efficiency, or resource utilization
meanings_and_examples.example: Using online shopping is often easier and more efficient than visiting a physical store when looking for specific items.
